CatDescriptText: Mr. Horace Hord, cleaning shop owner, 7310 Hermitage Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 15, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think common-law marriage should be outlawed?" answer reads: "Yes, it should be outlawed and the reason is that it is not ethical according to the modern standards of living."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Horace Hord, wearing two button striped suit jacket and light colored button down collared shirt, standing in front of brick wall, with street sign and building in background
